code: import{Grid,GridItem}from'@patternfly/react-core';import{PageLayout}from'../PageLayout/PageLayout';import{DashboardWidget}from'../DashboardWidget/DashboardWidget';import*as WebConfigAPI from'../../services/WebConfigService';import{useTitle}from'../../containers/useTitle';import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var DashboardPage=function DashboardPage(){var webConfig=WebConfigAPI.getWebConfig();var trafficLightsUrl=webConfig.grafana.trafficLightsUrl;var statusMapUrl=webConfig.grafana.statusMapUrl;useTitle('Dashboard');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageLayout,{title:"Dashboard",description:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:"The dashboard page contains the status of relevant services and the list of the builds and group builds triggered by the current user."}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{hasGutter:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GridItem,{span:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardWidget,{title:"Service Status",src:trafficLightsUrl})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GridItem,{span:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardWidget,{title:"Service Status Timeline",src:statusMapUrl})})]})});};
